DOC.brief_title: The Statins Glucose Homeostasis Subjects With Impaired Fasting Glucose
DOC.detailed_description: Statin therapy effectively reduce cardiovascular event . However , trial data1 meta-analyses suggest statin also confer increased risk development diabetes . In order elucidate whether statin increase risk diabetes , investigator conduct study evaluate effect rosuvastatin ( maybe high diabetogenic ) pravastatin ( seem protective ) glucose homeostasis biomarkers subject impair fast glucose .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 3570 year old 2 . Fasting blood glucose 100125 mg/dL 1 . A1C > 7.0 % 2 . 2hr glucose OGTT > 200 mg/dL 3 . Total cholesterol > 280 mg/dL 4 . Previous diabetic history , coronary artery disease 5 . Allergy rosuvastatin parvastatin 6 . Baseline ALT 3 time UNL 7 . Serum Cr > 2.0 mg/dL 8 . Pregnancy , breast feeding plan pregnant woman .
